comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Thee we adore, eternal Lord! We praise Thy Name with one accord, Thy saints, who here Thy goodness see, through all the world do worship Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: To Thee aloud all angels cry, the heav'ns and all the pow'rs on high: Thee, holy, holy, holy King, Lord God of hosts, they ever sing.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: From day to day, O Lord, do we highly exalt and honor Thee! Thy Name we worship and adore, world without end, for evermore!

verse.name: v5
